sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Update reference cascade rule for sys_flow_context_inputs_chunk document_id field from delete to none</description>
        <name>Update Input Chunk Reference Cascade Rul</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var dic = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
dic.addQuery("name", "sys_flow_context_inputs_chunk");
dic.addQuery("element", "document_id");
dic.query();

if (dic.next()) {
	gs.info("reference_cascade_rule of sys_flow_context_inputs_chunk before change is " + dic.getValue("reference_cascade_rule"));
	dic.setValue("reference_cascade_rule", "none");
	dic.setWorkflow(false);
	dic.update();
	gs.info("reference_cascade_rule of sys_flow_context_inputs_chunk after change is " + dic.getValue("reference_cascade_rule"));
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-11-29 01:40:43</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3bb535e94332311027d274d6ebb8f2e5</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Update Input Chunk Reference Cascade Rule</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Flow Designer - Flow Engine" source="com.glide.hub.flow_engine">5ce9b4683cf1311068bcf327dfe37fda</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_3bb535e94332311027d274d6ebb8f2e5</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-11-29 01:40:43</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Update Input Chunk Reference Cascade Rul
